Room.Name: Lelion Wildlife Preserve
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the eastern end of the Lelion Beach and Park wildlife preserve.
Room.LongDescription: A tall fence is across the walkway, but the gate is open and and a sign pointing to the east says this is the exit for the Lelion Beach and Park wildlife preserve. A walkway extends to the east and west from here. To the north you can see Lithium Inlet flowing from east to west, and emptying a lot of fresh water into the bay. On the south is a wooded area between the walkway and a cliffside.
